responses: Hi, welcome to JukeBot!
Hello! Ready to discover some tunes with JukeBot?
Goodbye, hope you find your next favorite song with JukeBot!
Take care, enjoy your music with JukeBot!
You're welcome, happy listening with JukeBot!
Glad I could help you discover new music with JukeBot!
I can help you discover music, suggest songs, fetch audio features, and talk all things music with JukeBot!
I'm JukeBot, your personal music assistant, ready to help you find your next favorite track and more!
Sure! What music-related help do you need today with JukeBot?
How can JukeBot assist you with your music needs?

patterns: Tell me about the audio features of [song name]
Can you show me the audio features of [song name]?
What are the features of [song name]?
responses: Here are the audio features for '[song name]': [features]. Want to listen to it on JukeBot?
The audio features for '[song name]' include tempo, key, danceability, and more. Would you like to hear the track?

patterns: What genre should I listen to?
responses: JukeBot can suggest anything from pop to rock, jazz to classical! What mood are you in?
Try listening to something new today with JukeBot! Want me to recommend a genre?
How about ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’ by Queen? It's a classic, and JukeBot can play it for you!
I recommend 'Blinding Lights' by The Weeknd if you're in the mood for something upbeat. Want to hear it on JukeBot?

patterns: I need a playlist for work/party
responses: I'll make you a playlist with JukeBot! What vibe are you going for?

Check out [artist name]'s greatest hits – JukeBot can play them for you!

patterns: Tell me about the album [album name]
Do you know the album [album name]?
responses: [Album name] by [artist] is a masterpiece! Want me to play a track on JukeBot?

patterns: I'm feeling sad, what should I listen to?

patterns: Do you have a favorite song?
responses: As a chatbot, I don't have preferences, but I can help you find your favorite song with JukeBot!
I don't have a favorite song, but I can help you find one on JukeBot!
I can help you with concert info! Want to know when [artist] is performing near you? JukeBot has all the details!
Check out the latest concert dates for [artist]! JukeBot can help you find the tickets.

patterns: Do you know any fun music trivia?
responses: Did you know that the longest song ever recorded is 18 hours long? JukeBot can play a shorter one if you'd prefer!
Here's a fun fact: The Beatles' ‘Hey Jude’ is one of the longest songs to ever hit No. 1 on the charts! JukeBot can play it for you!

patterns: What are the lyrics to [song name]?

patterns: What should I listen to in the morning?
